Name: Tamsulosin HCL 0.4 MG CAPSULE (Flomax)
Dosage: Take 1 capsule by mouth every night
Usage: Treats symptoms of an enlarged prostate (benign prostatic hyperplasia or BPH)
Helps relax muscles in the prostate and bladder neck to improve urine flow
May be used to aid in the passage of kidney stones

Uncommon Side Effects: Orthostatic hypotension (sudden drop in blood pressure when standing)
Intraoperative Floppy Iris Syndrome (IFIS) during cataract or glaucoma surgery
